response.original_title: Who am I? The Teachings of Sri Ramana Maharshi
response.overview: In February 2021 I was interviewed by Anthony Chene, a French film maker. He asked his questions via Zoom from France. My responses were filmed in my apartment in Perth, Australia. Anthony posted  a thirty-four minute version of the interview and gave me permission to upload a longer version that would include most of the material we covered. Anthony's version is here:
response.title: Who am I? The Teachings of Sri Ramana Maharshi
